This is an example of the organisations who belong to one of our private membership groups.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: We are an a educational and informational organisation and do not seek to influence EU policies. We follow legislative and regulatory developments affecting asset management.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: We have a number of events per year where we invite EU speakers to participate.
goals__remit: Institutional Investor Memberships are societies of unique groups of executives at investment management firms in the US and Europe who come together at Roundtable meetings and in small discussion groups to meet each other, to discuss critical industry issues and, in some of the groups, to market their services to major clients.
